name: LIGHTLEECH
description:
You got stranded on a pitch-black planet full of angry local fauna & flora.

Grab your gun.

Steal their light.

Survive.

LIGHTLEECH is a dimly-lit arena FPS about gathering light and shooting your way through unfriendly nocturnal creatures. Stay alive for as long as possible while dodging enemies and reloading your gun using abandoned energy pylons. But beware - each reload just brings on more of the locals.

Controls:

  • WASD / arrows - move
  • Left mouse - fire gun
  • Right mouse / Space - dash
  • R - reload (when available)

Created for the 7DFPS 2020 game jam.

CODE: Konrad Piechota, Bartłomiej Sieczka, Luke Spierewka

ART: Marcin Cecot, Anna Chwal, Weronika Grabowska

SOUND: Krzysztof Kus (Synthphonia)

MUSIC: Mikołaj Stroiński

SUPPORT: Kamila Spierewka

Additional assets: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/flash_1330254, https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/hospital_687529
